statements: UPDATE organizations SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE Organizations SET org_name = 'Company A' WHERE org_id = 1;
UPDATE AnonymizedData SET data_value = 'Sensitive Data Updated' WHERE user_id = 5;

UPDATE UserData SET data = 'Updated Data' WHERE user_id = 10 AND organization_id = 2;

UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
